mapper.select: SELECT tm.study_idx, tm.title, tm.content, tm.display_status, tm.display_start, tm.display_end, tm.`like`, tm.reg_date ,tm.image, tm.hashtag, tm.field, tm.share_people FROM tbl_mystudy as tm WHERE tm.study_idx = #{study_idx}
SELECT ts.share_idx, ts.receive_id, tm.name, ts.study_idx FROM tbl_share as ts inner join tbl_member as tm ON ts.receive_id = tm.user_id WHERE ts.study_idx = #{study_idx}

SELECT study_idx, title, display_status, display_start, display_end, `like`, reg_date FROM tbl_mystudy
order by reg_date desc
order by `like` desc
LIMIT #{page_skip_count}, #{page_size}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_mystudy(user_id, title,content, display_status, display_start, display_end, reg_date ,image, hashtag, field) VALUES(#{user_id},#{title},#{content},#{display_status},#{display_start},#{display_end},now(),#{image} ,#{hashtag},#{field})
mapper.select: SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID(study_idx) FROM tbl_mystudy order by study_idx desc LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_share SET receive_id = #{receive_id} WHERE study_idx = #{study_idx}
